alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 10:54AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin, south central Santa Rosa and south central Escambia Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1054 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Lillian, or 7 miles southwest of Warrington, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Brent, West Pensacola, Warrington, Gulf Breeze, Goulding, Lillian, Myrtle Grove, Oriole Beach and Pensacola Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
